body.p: Hotel owner in Danville, Kentucky. Casey County native. Married to Julie A. Watkins Riffe. Father of George Riffe, Ranna Riffe, Luanna Riffe, John M. Riffe, Florence Riffe, and Dotia Riffe. Land agent. Postmaster in Middleburg.
